p: To delimit the putative species, additionally to mPTP, we used the distance-based “ Automatic Barcode Gap Discovery” tool (ABGD, Puillandre et al., 2012). ABGD is a popular distance-based barcoding method that, compared to other distance-based methods attempts to automatically identify the threshold value for the transition from intra-specific variation to inter-specific divergence ( Puillandre et al., 2012).
